nodes.text: The Iskallon Light Frigate was a class of frigate employed by the Iskalloni species. The Stelaciter was of this class.

Anyone that looked at an Iskallon light frigate would see a gruesome sight. The starships looked like giant stones covered in moss; which were spherical but with a surface that was covered with numerous irregularities making them hardly look round. From the ship's rear jutted a plane housing the engines, with large supports holding them in place. Chunks of machinery and equipment intermittently sprung from the starship's surface at random intervals.
